personas.name: Beate Bumsbaum
personas.short_scenario: Beate is a 55-year-old non-technical user who uses the DigiFunk 1 system at home. She is not very tech-savvy and needs a simple and intuitive interface.

questions.question: How do I turn on the system?
questions.answer_found: Press the power button on the front panel.
questions.comment: The power button is clearly labeled on the front panel.
improvement_suggestions: Add a diagram showing the power button location
Include troubleshooting for when power button doesn't respond
Add information about standby mode indicators

questions.question: How do I adjust the volume?
questions.comment: Volume adjustment needs more detailed instructions.
improvement_suggestions: Specify the exact location of the volume knob
Explain minimum and maximum volume settings
Add information about mute functionality

questions.question: How do I reset the system?
questions.answer_found: Press and hold the reset button for 5 seconds.
improvement_suggestions: Clarify where the reset button is located
Explain what happens during a reset
Include when a reset should be performed

questions.question: How do I connect to Wi-Fi?
questions.answer_found: Go to settings and select Wi-Fi.
improvement_suggestions: Provide step-by-step instructions for connecting to Wi-Fi
Explain different Wi-Fi security options
Include troubleshooting for Wi-Fi connection issues
